segments.text: Is this the right subway to the Wall Street ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you tell me shall I take the express or local train ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . The local train . It stops at every station .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Which of them is the local train , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You take the D train on the downtown platform , and go three stops .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One dollar and twenty cents . You give me the money and I â€™ ll exchange it for a token .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What should I do with the token ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You put it in the slot at the turnstile and then push the turnstile to get into the platform .
segments.speaker: S1
